sentences.en: A thigh injury increasingly hindered her mobility.
sentences.cn: 大腿受伤使她行动愈发不便。

sentences.en: Blood poured from the main artery of the thigh.
sentences.cn: 血从大腿的主动脉涌出.

sentences.en: Hamstrings are supporting muscles at the back of the thigh.
sentences.cn: 腿筋是位于大腿后侧起支撑作用的肌肉。

sentences.en: He felt a sharp pain in the abductor muscle in his right thigh.
sentences.cn: 他感到右大腿外展肌一阵剧痛。

sentences.en: He is suffering from a strained thigh muscle.
sentences.cn: 他的大腿肌肉拉伤了，疼得很。

sentences.en: He locked his knee against the man's inner thigh and sent him sprawling to the ground.
sentences.cn: 他用膝盖抵住那个人的大腿内侧，将他按趴在地上。

sentences.en: He tore a muscle in his right thigh.
sentences.cn: 他右大腿的一块肌肉拉伤了。

sentences.en: I wasn't badly hurt, but I injured my thigh and had to limp.
sentences.cn: 我伤得不重，但一条大腿伤到了，只好一瘸一拐地走。

sentences.en: She was wearing a white dress slit to the thigh.
sentences.cn: 她身穿一条开叉开到了大腿的白色连衣裙。

sentences.en: The bullet lodged in the sergeant's leg, shattering his thigh bone.
sentences.cn: 子弹嵌进了中士的腿里，使其股骨碎裂。

sentences.en: The man's gun flicked up from beside his thigh.
sentences.cn: 那个男人迅速从大腿一侧抽出枪来。

sentences.en: The pain originated from a point in his right thigh.
sentences.cn: 疼痛是从他右大腿的某处开始的。

sentences.en: The shorts are so small I can't fit my thighs into any of them.
sentences.cn: 短裤太小了，我的大腿塞不进去。

sentences.en: The vowel in words like 'my' and 'thigh' is not very difficult.
sentences.cn: 单词my和thigh中的元音并不难发。

sentences.en: The vowel in words like "my" and "thigh" is not very difficult.
sentences.cn: 单词my和thigh中的元音并不难发。

trans.tran_cn: 股，大腿，食用的鸡（等的）腿
trans.tran_en: the top part of your leg, between your knee and your hip
